title: Can’t wait for Hulu’s cult thriller The Clearing? Here are 4 TV shows just like it
description: Hulu just dropped the official trailer for a new TV show called The Clearing. While we wait for it to premiere, here are four more cult thrillers to watch.

title: Hackers target years-old surveillance camera security flaw
description: There had been more than 50,000 breach attempts on TBK DVRs already.

title: AMD confirms normal-priced Radeon 7600 GPU for normal people at last
description: AMD has officially confirmed that it will be releasing more Radeon RX 7000-series GPUs, which will most likely include mid-range 7700 and 7600 options.

title: Canon wants to bring down the cost of printing with affordable ink tank printers but isn’t discounting laser printers yet
description: Six new printers from one of the market leaders target SMB, work-from-home employees.

title: TP-Link routers targeted by Mirai botnet once again, US government warns
description: CISA issues a warning to US government agencies, urging them to patch immediately.

title: ChatGPT could be worse than cryptocurrency when it comes to scams
description: Alarm is growing over the rise in ChatGPT scams, with Meta warning it could be worse than what we saw with cryptocurrency.

title: Dune Part 2 trailer teases thrills, sci-fi spills, and Timothée Chalamet riding a sandworm
description: The first trailer for Dune: Part Two has debuted online – and it looks and sounds as epic as we expected it to.

title: Motorola Razr 40 Ultra specs leak reveals Snapdragon 8 Plus Gen 1 and more
description: A new Motorola Razr 40 Ultra specs leak points to an older processor, but it’s still plenty powerful.

title: ChatGPT gets a new feature – but would you trust AI to help you buy a house?
description: A three-bedroom house? In an up-and-coming area? With an open house this weekend? Step this way…

title: Squarespace wants to help you build a website much quicker than before
description: Squarespace Blueprint website design system is now included in its site building tool.

title: Porn VPN searches soar in Utah amid age verification bill
description: The move comes as Utah becomes the last US state to introduce mandatory age verification to access porn sites, causing a spike of interest in VPN services.

title: Google used AI to make a puzzle game that rivals Wordle
description: Google has used AI to help create four games including XYZ Toy, a puzzle game that rivals Wordle.

title: World Press Freedom Day: organizations join forces to save encryption
description: With encrypted communication increasingly under siege across democracies, the coalition seeks to protect privacy to promote press freedom.

title: Some of the top AMD chips are suffering a serious security flaw
description: A novel flaw can be used to read sensitive content on AMD Zen chips, researchers warn.

title: Here's the real reason James Gunn put Zune in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 thrusts the unloved Zune back into the spotlight, and I asked its director why he chose it.

title: FBI, Europol make hundreds of arrests in dark web shutdown
description: SpecTor shutdown sees almost 300 people arrested, and millions of dollars taken.

title: AMD promises its new laptop chips will crush the Apple M2 - and it’s got reciepts
description: AMD’s new ‘Phoenix’ chips could change the gaming laptop landscape forever, with better performance and battery life.

title: Google now lets you log in without a password
description: Google becomes the first big tech player to allow its users to login to their accounts without a password.

title: Xbox just revealed a new way to get 2 weeks of free Game Pass Ultimate
description: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate and PC subscribers now have a chance to get 2 weeks for free if they’re referred by a friend.

title: 1Password reassures users following password change notification scare
description: 1Password has clarified that it has not suffered a security breach.

title: US and EU warn Malaysia on Huawei 5G deal
description: Malaysia could allow Huawei to build its 5G network and Western leaders are worried.

title: After hearing Moon's new amplification system, most consumer hi-fi is dead to me
description: An evening spent with Moon's new North 'mid range' amplification system and Audiovector R6 Arreté speakers has ruined most other home systems for me.

title: Garmin could soon challenge the Apple Watch Ultra with the Epix 2 Pro
description: One of Garmin's most powerful sports watches, the Epix 2, could soon get an updated version, according to fresh rumors.

title: Google TV gets a free update to make it faster and slicker to use
description: The Google TV platform is getting a free update, speeding up its response times, and reducing the size of apps by ‘roughly 25%’.

title: Chrome is removing this useful security warning tool - so be on your guard
description: The lock icon has been a part of Chrome for years, warning users about possible security risks.

title: Samsung Galaxy S23 FE could get a 50MP main camera – but you might have to wait for it
description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 FE is rumored to still be in the works – and it could pack a 50MP main camera.

title: Titanfall director is “finding the fun in something new” for Respawn
description: Titanfall director Steve Fukuda is working with Respawn to lead a small team in conjuring up a new IP.

title: The Samsung Galaxy Watch series just got better for music fans, thanks to Bixby
description: Bixby on the Samsung Galaxy Watch 5 and Watch 4 has had a substantial update, with music recognition at its heart.

title: LinkedIn wants to use AI to help you nail that job application
description: Generative AI can now message hiring staff and managers for you, but it hasn’t been met without criticism.

title: Microsoft is testing a private business version of ChatGPT to prevent any data leaks
description: Would you be happy if your bank used ChatGPT with your sensitive information? Microsoft thinks it has the answer.

title: Two more classic Apple products are heading for the graveyard
description: Apple is reportedly adding the Thunderbolt Display and original iPad Air to its official obsolete products list.

title: Box thinks AI is the key to making you more productive
description: Box AI will integrate ChatGPT into its cloud storage platform to digest existing work and create new content.

title: The RTX 4090 is finally getting cheaper – but there’s bad news for some
description: If you’ve had your eye on Nvidia’s flagship GPU, now might be the time to snap one up – but only if you need the power it offers.

title: Netflix users cancel subscriptions amid growing feud over writers' strike
description: TV and movie writers have called on Netflix users to leave the service over its role in the ongoing writers' strike.

title: Nokia XR21 could have been the perfect rugged smartphone, if not for these three drawbacks
description: A high launch price, lack of wireless charging and a USB 2.0 port left us perplexed.

title: Status Between 3ANC earbuds claim noise cancellation to put AirPods Pro to shame
description: Status Between 3ANC earbuds: confusing name, massive triple driver ANC claims…

title: The Samsung Galaxy S24 might be very hard to tell apart from the Galaxy S23
description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 and Galaxy S24 Plus could have identical designs to their predecessors.

title: Businesses are more prepared for cyberattacks than ever - but they still aren't confident
description: Businesses are moving the needle, but are wary of the future.

title: AWS has a new way to secure remote working
description: AWS reckons it can protect workers and companies without having to use an annoying VPN.

title: No, gamers aren’t fleeing Windows 11 in droves – quite the opposite
description: In fact, Windows 11 just hit a big milestone: 1 in 3 gamers are now using Microsoft’s OS.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Wednesday, May 3 (game #464)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Motorola brings the Edge 40 Pro to North America with a new name and battery
description: The Edge Plus 2023 keeps much of what made the Edge 40 Pro great while upgrading the battery to last two whole days.
